content: I've seen a few issues like https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/54283 and https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/89806 where they seemingly no longer occur, or have been fixed by a PR, yet have not been closed. Is there a way to tell triagebot to review the issue?
No, but feel free to link issues that have been fixed here and someone with permissions can close them :)

Fixed by https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/91212:

  • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/92265
  • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/92015
  • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/91335

No longer ICEs:

  • https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/84044

As a side note, it would be nice to be able to help out by either closing resolved issues or labeling them as resolved using rustbot.
Maybe contributors could be allowed to add an S-can-close label to issues?
